page.title: 02FESTIVITIES
page.content: We celebrate Christmas by having parties for children.Baroness Willoughby de Eresby invites five to eleven year olds for games and tea. We have paper hats and crackers and a Christmas tree is decorated.There is a present for everyone.There is an entertainment-sometimes a magician,sometimes a cartoon film and sometimes a disco.A disco is dancing to pop music.Coloured lights flash on and off.Everyone may make up there own dance.The Steam Action Group give a party for the over sixties.One of there members makes up a pantomime.A pantomime is a fairy tale with music.The pricipal boy is usually a girl.A harvest festival service is held round about September-October time to give thanks for good crops.At Easter time we celebrate by having Easter eggs.
